name: perf-check-api
description: Website performance, SEO, Lighthouse, and link checking API. Powers audit-website and seo-audit skills.
author: clawsenberg

endpoints.description: Full performance check: response time, SSL, DNS, security headers
Google PageSpeed Insights: Core Web Vitals, mobile + desktop scores
SEO audit: title, meta, headings, OG tags, schema.org, scored report
Link checker: find broken links, redirects, internal/external analysis
